core

Class ShuffleCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ShuffleCommand

  • public abstract class ShuffleCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a shuffle command. These are created elsewhere by a player using the static factory methods. A command has a number of points, ranging from 1 to 6, which indicates the entropy in the deck it causes.
    Author:
    Daan

    • Method Detail

      • createRandomShuffleCommand

        public static ShuffleCommand createRandomShuffleCommand()
        Creates a new shuffle command: random shuffle.
        This command shuffles the cards in the deck using randomization.
        Points: 6
        Algorithm: Knuth / Fisher-Yates
        Returns:
        ShuffleCommand

      • createRiffleShuffleCommand

        public static ShuffleCommand createRiffleShuffleCommand()
        Creates a new shuffle command: riffle shuffle.
        This command shuffles the cards in the deck using a riffle shuffle.
        Points: 3
        Algorithm: Own interpretation
        Returns:
        ShuffleCommand

      • createMultiRiffleShuffle

        public static ShuffleCommand createMultiRiffleShuffle(int n)
        Creates a new shuffle command: multi riffle shuffle.
        This command shuffles the cards in the deck using n riffle shuffles.
        Points: 3*n
        Parameters:
        n - Amount of riffle shuffles performed.
        Returns:
        ShuffleCommand

      • createHinduShuffle

        public static ShuffleCommand createHinduShuffle(int portionSize,
                                int maximumDrop)
        Creates a new shuffle command: hindu shuffle.
        This command shuffles the cards in the deck using a hindu shuffle.
        Points: 2
        Algorithm:
        1. take a portion of the given size (portionSize) form the bottom of the deck
        2. take a small amount of cards (random size between 1 and maximumDrop) from the portion
        3. drop the small portion on top of the remainder of the cards
        4. repeat step 2 and 3 until the portion is gone
        Youtube video
        Parameters:
        portionSize - integer between 16 and 32
        maximumDrop - integer between 1 and 10
        Returns:
        ShuffleCommand
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when not respecting above bounds.
